directions: Slice the potatoes, arranging the slices evenly, to the top of a baking dish.
Pour in the melted butter. Bake at 200ºC for about 30 minutes.
When brown, drain off the excess butter. Bake another 5 minutes.
Allow to cool for a few minutes.
Invert the cooked potato on to a serving dish.
Serve as a side dish to an entrée.
ingredients: 700gm Russet potatoes – peeled and sliced (1cm thick)
title: Pommes Anna (Anna Potatoes)
